EmailTemplate.subject: Stay Connected with Honeywell
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Welcome to the Honeywell Connected Quarterly newsletter, where you can catch up on Honeywell’s latest Connected Aircraft updates. Want to learn more or schedule an executive interview? Just click "Contact Us" at the bottom of the page to send us a response directly. You can also find us on Oct. 10–12 at the National Business Aviation Association show in Las Vegas at booth #N5100! Lufthansa Leads the Way Lufthansa, Honeywell and Inmarsat are answering the call for faster and more consistent Wi-Fi during flight. As one of the first airlines in the world to install Honeywell’s JetWave™ hardware, paired with Inmarsat’s Global Xpress satellite, Lufthansa offers high-speed and reliable in-flight Wi-Fi so passengers can stay connected anywhere in the world. Click the video above for a look at the installation of JetWave. Below, learn more about how Lufthansa is connecting its passengers to a better in-flight experience. 4 Days to a Connected Aircraft Airlines are learning how quickly high-speed Wi-Fi can be installed. Lufthansa Q&A: Why We Picked Honeywell Lufthansa's Floris Reimbold on how this Wi-Fi program came to be. Now we want to hear from you. To learn more about what you've read today or to schedule an interview, contact Adam Kress at adam.kress@honeywell.com <[[mailto:adam.kress@honeywell.com]]> or click the button below.
